オプション1: The orange object was a skeletonized body lit by the torch.

(Probably an islander's.
I'd like to examine the body, but...)

Even though it had turned to bone, touching a human corpse was terrifying.
(It was hard just to get here... it's now or never.)
Star Man steeled himself and examined the body.

Among the belongings were two maps.
One seemed to be a map of this island. It didn't mark the current location,
but from where he'd walked so far, he could roughly guess.
He also found a map marking the Radeou Union, the Republic of GEFORQE, and this island.

(It seems this place is called Prolitan Island. I'll show everyone later.
The nearest, the Republic of GEFORQE, is about 100 km away.
Swimming there is impossible...)
